doc:
Joseph Malerba https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Malerba 0 Joseph Malerba (born 5 October 1962) is a French actor most recently known for his role as police detective Walter Morlighem in the tough French TV series Braquo. He has also played roles in many other French films and television series since 1992, including Leon in 1994 and Mesrine Part 2 (2008), as well as in the theatre. Joseph_Malerba ( born_5_October_1962 ) is a_French_actor most_recently_known for his_role as police_detective_Walter_Morlighem in the_tough_French_TV_series_Braquo . He has_also_played roles in many_other_French_films_and_television_series since 1992 , including Leon in 1994 and Mesrine_Part_2_(_2008_) , as_well_as in the_theatre .
